title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Mobility Support Company

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to provide training and equipment to enhance logistics support and sustainment for Ugandan forces deploying in support of AMISOM against al-Shabaab. Equipment provided includes vehicles, ammunition, radios, and medical supplies.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Engineer Support Company

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to provide training and equipment for the Ugandan Engineer Support Element to improve mobility on the battlefield, enhance protection, and improve counter-improvised explosive device (C-IED) capabilities against al-Shabaab while deployed in support of AMISOM. Construction vehicles, engineer training equipment, ammunition, and training equipment for explosives and demolitions will be provided.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Tactical Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) Capability

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build a UAS capability that will enhance the ability of the Ugandan Air Force Raven Detachment to conduct CT operations by greatly improving its air coverage, tactical effectiveness, and the operational reach of its forces engaged against al-Shabaab while deployed in support of AMISOM. Equipment provided includes armored vehicles and Raven Unmanned Aerial Systems.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Air Mobility

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).
